column1: Are you a pandemic? Because you have my heart on lockdown.
column2: Are you locking down with me? Because I want to flatten your curves.

column11: Distance makes my love grow stronger for you.

column13: Do you quarantine often? When’s the last time you had a 14 night stand?
column14: Don't take the mask off please, I prefer safe sex.
column15: During this quarantine we have to stock up on essential supplies. Come home with me and my stockpile will be complete!
